text:
Using the "wribable" attribute of the vsscheckout task results in an error "The
<vsscheckout> type doesn't support the "writable" attribute.

Sample:

		<vsscheckout vsspath="$/Tools/2.0/VersionNo.h"
             ssdir="${vsspath}"
             serverPath="${sspath}"
             writablefiles="replace" writable="true"
             failonerror="true"
             login="${ssauth}"/>
creator: jeff.s.bailey@gmail.com
peterreilly@apache.org
